description: Try our easy to follow Beef Rendang recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beef Rendang Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a heavy based casserole dish over mediumhigh heat. Spray dish with oil. Cook the beef in batches, turning until browned. Transfer to a clean plate.
Add the curry paste, cinnamon, tamarind and lemongrass to dish. Stir for 1 minute until fragrant. Return the beef to dish.
Add stock, coconut milk and half the lime leaves. Stir, season and cover. Reduce heat to mediumlow. Simmer, stirring occasionally for 45-50 minutes until beef is tender.
Scatter curry with remaining shredded lime leaves and sliced red chilli. Serve with rice, pickled qukes, coconut and steamed green vegetables.
